GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.15.27
GSD.description:
net: fix up skbs delta_truesize in UDP GRO frag_list

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.27 by commit 3a65b82b1ef28ec97233e77e93a265035f948ea5, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit 53475c5dd856212e91538a9501162e821cc1f791. For more details please see the references link.
